name: spidertron-logistics
title: Spidertron Logistics
author: mad_engineer
description: Yet another mod that turns your spidertrons into a walking trains. Adds 6 pairs of loading zones and drop zones per surface and makes spidertrons walk between them. You have to set your logistic requests forehand. When spidertron arrives to loading station it turns on logistic requests and waits according to timer. When it arrives to drop station it turns all logistic requests off and dumps all its inventory into your bots network
